attributes.action: That Guy Fawkes should recieve a knighthood for an attempted good deed to Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No longer should we burn this mans effigy at the stake, but we should celebrate that he tried to do what we all wish we could do everytime you waste our tax money on your childish little schemes

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
